arabicText: ۞ فَمَا كَانَ جَوَابَ قَوْمِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓا۟ أَخْرِجُوٓا۟ ءَالَ لُوطٍۢ مِّن قَرْيَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ أُنَاسٌۭ يَتَطَهَّرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	the	answer	of	his	people	was	
nothing	except	that	they	said,	“Expel	the	
family	of	Lut	from	your	township;	these	
people	wish	purity!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	uski	qaum	ka	kuchh	jawāb	na	tha	magar	
yeh	ke	bole	Lūt	ke	gharāne	ko	apni	basti	se	
nikāl	do	yeh	log	to	suthra	pan	chāhte	haiñ.

arabicText: فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمْرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرْنَـٰهَا مِنَ ٱلْغَـٰبِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
We	therefore	rescued	him	and	his	family,	
except	his	wife;	We	had	decreed	that	she	is	
of	those	who	will	remain	behind.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	hum	ne	usey	aur	uske	ghar	wālon	ko	
najāt	di	magar	uski	aurat	ko	hum	ne	thahra	
diya	tha	ke	woh	reh	jāne	Wāloñ	meiñ	hai.

arabicText: وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِم مَّطَرًۭا ۖ فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	We	showered	a	rain	upon	them;	so	
what	a	wretched	rain	for	those	who	were	
warned!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	hum	ne	un	par	ek	barsāo	barsaya	to	
kya	hi	bura	barsāo	tha	daraye	huwoñ	ka

arabicText: قُلِ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ وَسَلَـٰمٌ عَلَىٰ عِبَادِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱصْطَفَىٰٓ ۗ ءَآللَّهُ خَيْرٌ أَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Say	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	
and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“All	praise	is	to	
Allah,	and	peace	upon	His	chosen	
bondmen;	is	Allah	better	or	what	you	
ascribe	as	His	partners?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	kaho	sab	khoobiyāñ	Allah	ko	aur	
salām	uske	chune	huwe	bandoñ	par	kya	
Allah	behtar	ya	unke	sākhta	(Man-Ghadat)	
shareek.

arabicText: أَمَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَأَنزَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۭ فَأَنۢبَتْنَا بِهِۦ حَدَآئِقَ ذَاتَ بَهْجَةٍۢ مَّا كَانَ لَكُمْ أَن تُنۢبِتُوا۟ شَجَرَهَآ ۗ أَءِلَـٰهٌۭ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌۭ يَعْدِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Or	He	Who	created	the	heavens	and	the	
earth,	and	sent	down	water	from	the	sky	
for	you;	so	We	grew	delightful	gardens	
with	it;	you	had	no	strength	to	grow	its	
trees;	is	there	a	God	along	with	Allah?!	In	
fact	they	are	those	who	shun	the	right	
path.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ya	woh	jis	ne	āasmān	aur	zameen	banay	
aur	tumhārey	liye	āasmān	se	pāni	utaara	to	
ham	ne	us	se	bāgh	ugāye	raunaq	wāle	
tumhāri	ṭāqat	nā	thi	ke	un	ke	ped	ugātey	
kyā	Allāh	ke	sāth	koi	aur	khudā	hai	balke	
woh	log	rāh	se	katrāte	haiñ.

arabicText: أَمَّن جَعَلَ ٱلْأَرْضَ قَرَارًۭا وَجَعَلَ خِلَـٰلَهَآ أَنْهَـٰرًۭا وَجَعَلَ لَهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَجَعَلَ بَيْنَ ٱلْبَحْرَيْنِ حَاجِزًا ۗ أَءِلَـٰهٌۭ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Or	He	Who	made	the	earth	for	habitation,	
and	placed	rivers	within	it,	and	created	
mountains	as	anchors	for	it,	and	kept	a	
barrier	between	the	two	seas?	Is	there	a	God	along	with	Allah?!	In	fact,	most	of	them	are	ignorant.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ya	woh	jis	ne	zameen	basne	ko	banāi	aur	
us	ke	beech	meiñ	nahreñ	nikaliñ	aur	us	ke	liye	langar	banāye	aur	donoñ	samundaroñ	meiñ	āadh	
rakhi	kyā	Allah	ke	sāth	koi	aur	khudā	hai	balke	un	meiñ	aksar	jāhil	haiñ.

arabicText: أَمَّن يُجِيبُ ٱلْمُضْطَرَّ إِذَا دَعَاهُ وَيَكْشِفُ ٱلسُّوٓءَ وَيَجْعَلُكُمْ خُلَفَآءَ ٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ أَءِلَـٰهٌۭ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ قَلِيلًۭا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Or	He	Who	answers	the	prayer	of	the	helpless	when	he	invokes	Him	and	removes	the	evil,	and	
makes	you	inheritors	of	the	earth?	Is	there	a	God	along	with	Allah?!	Very	little	do	they	ponder!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ya	woh	jo	lā-chār	ki	suntā	hai	jab	usey	pukāre	aur	door	kar	detā	hai	burāi	aur	tumheñ	zameen	
wāris	kartā	hai	kyā	Allāh	ke	sāth	aur	khudā	hai?	Bahut	hi	kam	dhiyān	karte	ho.

arabicText: أَمَّن يَهْدِيكُمْ فِى ظُلُمَـٰتِ ٱلْبَرِّ وَٱلْبَحْرِ وَمَن يُرْسِلُ ٱلرِّيَـٰحَ بُشْرًۢا بَيْنَ يَدَىْ رَحْمَتِهِۦٓ ۗ أَءِلَـٰهٌۭ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ تَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Or	He	Who	shows	you	the	path	in	the	darkness	of	the	land	and	the	sea,	and	He	Who	sends	the	
winds	before	His	mercy,	heralding	glad	tidings?	Is	there	a	God	along	with	Allah?!	Supremacy	is	to	
Allah	above	all	that	they	ascribe	as	partners!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ya	woh	jo	tumheñ	rāh	dikhātā	hai	khushki	aur	tari	ki	andheriyoñ	meiñ	aur	woh	ke	hawāyeñ	
bhejtā	hai	apni	Raḥmat	ke	āage	khushkhabri	sunāti	kyā	Allāh	ke	sāth	koi	aur	khudā	hai?	Bartar	
hai	Allāh	un	ke	shirk	se.

arabicText: أَمَّن يَبْدَؤُا۟ ٱلْخَلْقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ وَمَن يَرْزُقُكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ أَءِلَـٰهٌۭ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ قُلْ هَاتُوا۟ بُرْهَـٰنَكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Or	He	Who	initiates	the	creation,	then	will	
create	it	again,	and	He	Who	provides	you	
sustenance	from	the	skies	and	the	earth?	Is	
there	a	God	along	with	Allah?!	Proclaim,	
“Bring	your	proof,	if	you	are	truthful!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ya	woh	jo	khalq	ki	ibtidā	farmata	hai	phir	
usey	dobārā	banāye	ga	aur	woh	jo	tumheñ	
āasmānoñ	aur	zameen	se	rozi	detā	hai	kyā	
Allāh	ke	sāth	koi	aur	khudā	hai	tum	farmāō	
ke	apni	dalil	lāō	agar	tum	sachche	ho.

arabicText: قُل لَّا يَعْلَمُ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ٱلْغَيْبَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَمَا يَشْعُرُونَ أَيَّانَ يُبْعَثُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Say	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	
and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“None	in	the	
heavens	and	the	earth	know	the	hidden	by	
themselves,	except	Allah;	and	they	do	not	
know	when	they	will	be	raised.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāō	khud	ghaib	nahiñ	jānte	jo	koi	
āasmānoñ	aur	zameen	meiñ	haiñ	magar	
Allāh	aur	unheñ	khabar	nahiñ	ke	kab	
uthāye	jāyeñ	ge.

arabicText: بَلِ ٱدَّٰرَكَ عِلْمُهُمْ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّۢ مِّنْهَا ۖ بَلْ هُم مِّنْهَا عَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Has	their	knowledge	advanced	so	much	as	
to	know	the	Hereafter?	On	the	contrary,	
they	are	in	doubt	concerning	it;	in	fact	they	
are	blind	towards	it.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	un	ke	‘ilm	kā	silsila	āakhirat	ke	jān	ne	
tak	pahuñch	gayā	koi	nahiñ	woh	us	ki	ṭaraf	
se	shak	meiñ	haiñ	balki	woh	us	se	andhe	
haiñ.

arabicText: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَءِذَا كُنَّا تُرَٰبًۭا وَءَابَآؤُنَآ أَئِنَّا لَمُخْرَجُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	the	disbelievers	said,	“Will	we,	when	
we	and	our	forefathers	have	turned	into	
dust,	be	removed	again?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kāfir	bole	kyā	jab	ham	aur	hamāre	bāp	
dada	mitti	ho	jāyeñ	ge	kyā	ham	phir	nikāle	
jāyeñ	ge.

arabicText: لَقَدْ وُعِدْنَا هَـٰذَا نَحْنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا مِن قَبْلُ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
“Indeed	this	promise	was	given	to	us,	and	
before	us	to	our	forefathers	-	this	is	
nothing	but	stories	of	former	people.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	us	ka	w’ada	diyā	gayā	ham	ko	aur	
ham	se	pahle	hamāre	bāp	dādāōñ	ko	ye	to	
nahiñ	magar	agloñ	ki	kahāniyāñ.

arabicText: قُلْ سِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
“Proclaim,	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	
peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“Travel	
in	the	land	and	see	what	sort	of	fate	befell	
the	guilty.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāō	zameen	meiñ	chal	kar	dekho	
kaisa	hua	anjām	mujrimoñ	kā.

arabicText: وَلَا تَحْزَنْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا تَكُن فِى ضَيْقٍۢ مِّمَّا يَمْكُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	do	not	grieve	upon	them,	nor	be	
distressed	because	of	their	scheming.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	tum	in	par	gham	na	khāō	aur	un	ke	
makr	se	dil	tang	na	ho.

arabicText: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	they	say,	“When	will	this	promise	
come,	if	you	are	truthful?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kahte	haiñ	kab	āaye	ga	ye	w’ada	agar	
tum	sachche	ho.

arabicText: قُلْ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ رَدِفَ لَكُم بَعْضُ ٱلَّذِى تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
englishTranslationText: Say,	“It	could	be	that	a	part	of	what	you	are	impatient	for	is	(already)	after	you.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāō	qareeb	hai	ke	tumhāre	piche	
āa	lagi	ho	b’az	woh	chiz	jis	ki	tum	jaldi	
machā	rahe	ho.

arabicText: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَذُو فَضْلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَشْكُرُونَ
englishTranslationText: Indeed	your	Lord	is	Most	Munificent	upon	mankind,	but	most	men	do	not	give	thanks.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	be-shak	terā	Rab	fazl	wālā	hai	āadmiyoñ	par	lekin	aksar	āadmi	ḥaq	nahiñ	mānte.

arabicText: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَيَعْلَمُ مَا تُكِنُّ صُدُورُهُمْ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ
englishTranslationText: And	indeed	your	Lord	knows	what	is	hidden	in	their	bosoms,	and	what	they	disclose.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	be-shak	tumhārā	Rab	jāntā	hai	jo	un	ke	sinoñ	meiñ	chupi	hai	aur	jo	woh	zāhir	karte	haiñ.

arabicText: وَمَا مِنْ غَآئِبَةٍۢ فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا فِى كِتَـٰبٍۢ مُّبِينٍ
englishTranslationText:
And	all	the	hidden	secrets	of	the	heavens	and	the	earth	are	(written)	in	a	clear	Book.	(The	
Preserved	Tablet)
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	jitney	ghaib	haiñ	āasmān	aur	zameen	ke	sab	aik	batāne	wāli	Kitāb	meiñ	haiñ.

arabicText: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ يَقُصُّ عَلَىٰ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ أَكْثَرَ ٱلَّذِى هُمْ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ
englishTranslationText: Indeed	this	Qur’an	narrates	to	the	Descendants	of	Israel	most	of	the	matters	in	which	they	differ.
romanUrduTranslationText: Be-shak	ye	qurāan	ƶikr	fermātā	hai	bani	Isrāil	se	aksar	woh	bāteñ	jis	meiñ	woh	ikhtilāf	karte	haiñ

arabicText: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَهُدًۭى وَرَحْمَةٌۭ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	indeed	it	is	a	guidance	and	a	mercy	for	
the	Muslims.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	be-shak	woh	hidāyat	aur	Raḥmat	hai	
Musalmānoñ	ke	liye.

arabicText: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَقْضِى بَيْنَهُم بِحُكْمِهِۦ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	your	Lord	judges	between	them	
with	His	command;	and	He	is	the	Almighty,	
the	All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	tumhārā	Rab	un	ke	āapas	meiñ	
faisla	farmāta	hai	apne	ḥukm	se	aur	wohi	
hai	ízzat	wālā	‘ilm	wālā.

arabicText: فَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَى ٱلْحَقِّ ٱلْمُبِينِ
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	rely	on	Allah;	you	are	indeed	
upon	the	clear	Truth.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	tum	Allāh	par	bharosa	karo	be-shak	
tum	roshan	ḥaq	par	ho.

arabicText: إِنَّكَ لَا تُسْمِعُ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ وَلَا تُسْمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا وَلَّوْا۟ مُدْبِرِينَ ٨٠
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	the	dead	*	do	not	listen	to	your	call	
nor	do	the	deaf	*	listen	to	your	call,	when	
they	flee	turning	back.	(The	dead	and	deaf	
implies	the	disbelievers.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	tumhāre	sunāye	nahiñ	sunte	
murde	aur	na	tumhāre	sunāye	bahre	pukār	
suneñ	jab	phireñ	peeth	de	kar.

arabicText: وَمَآ أَنتَ بِهَـٰدِى ٱلْعُمْىِ عَن ضَلَـٰلَتِهِمْ ۖ إِن تُسْمِعُ إِلَّا مَن يُؤْمِنُ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا فَهُم مُّسْلِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	you	will	not	guide	the	blind	out	of	
their	error;	and	none	listen	to	you	except	
those	who	accept	faith	in	Our	signs,	and	
they	are	Muslims.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	andhoñ	ko	un	ki	gumrāhi	se	tum	
hidāyat	karne	wale	nahiñ	tumhāre	sunāye	
to	wohi	sunte	haiñ	jo	hamāri	Āayatoñ	par	
Iman	late	haiñ	aur	woh	Musalmān	haiñ.

arabicText: ۞ وَإِذَا وَقَعَ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَيْهِمْ أَخْرَجْنَا لَهُمْ دَآبَّةًۭ مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ تُكَلِّمُهُمْ أَنَّ ٱلنَّاسَ كَانُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا لَا يُوقِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	the	Word	(promise)	appears	
upon	them,	We	shall	bring	forth	for	them	a	
beast	from	the	earth	to	speak	to	them	-	
because	the	people	were	not	accepting	
faith	in	Our	signs.	(This beast will rise from 
the earth, when the Last Day draws near.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	bāt	un	par	āa	pade	gi		ham	zameen	
se	un	ke	liye	aik	chaupāya	nikāleñ	ge	jo	
logoñ	se	kalām	kare	ga	is	liye	ke	log	hamāri	
āayatoñ	par	Imān	na	late	the.

arabicText: وَيَوْمَ نَحْشُرُ مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةٍۢ فَوْجًۭا مِّمَّن يُكَذِّبُ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا فَهُمْ يُوزَعُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	the	Day	when	We	will	raise	from	every	
nation	an	army	that	denies	Our	signs	–	so	
the	former	groups	will	be	held	back	for	the	
latter	to	join	them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jis	din	uthāyeñ	ge	ham	har	giroh	meiñ	
se	aik	fauj	jo	hamāri	Āayatoñ	ko	jhutlāti	hai	
to	un	ke	agle	roke	jāyeñ	ge	ke	pichle	un	se	
āa	mileñ.

arabicText: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُو قَالَ أَكَذَّبْتُم بِـَٔايَـٰتِى وَلَمْ تُحِيطُوا۟ بِهَا عِلْمًا أَمَّاذَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Until	when	they	all	come	together,	He	will	say,	“Did	you	deny	My	signs	whereas	your	knowledge	
had	not	reached	it,	or	what	were	the	deeds	you	were	doing?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yahāñ	tak	ke	jab	sab	ḥāzir	ho	leñ	ge	
farmāye	ga	kya	tum	ne	meri	āayateñ	
jhutlāyiñ	ḥālāñ	ke	tumhārā	‘ilm	un	tak	na	
phuñchtā	thā	yā	kyā	kām	karte	the.

arabicText: وَوَقَعَ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَيْهِم بِمَا ظَلَمُوا۟ فَهُمْ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
englishTranslationText: And	the	Word	has	appeared	upon	them	because	of	their	injustice,	so	now	they	do	not	speak.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	bāt	pad	chuki	un	par	un	ke	zulm	ke	sabab	to	woh	ab	kuch	nahiñ	bolte.

arabicText: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّا جَعَلْنَا ٱلَّيْلَ لِيَسْكُنُوا۟ فِيهِ وَٱلنَّهَارَ مُبْصِرًا ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍۢ لِّقَوْمٍۢ يُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Did	they	not	see	that	We	created	the	night	for	them	to	rest	in,	and	created	the	day	providing	
sight?	Indeed	in	this	are	signs	for	the	people	who	have	faith.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kyā	unhoñ	ne	na	dekhā	ke	Ham	ne	rāt	banāi	ke	is	meiñ	āarām	kareñ	aur	din	ko	banāyā	sujhāne	
(dikhāne)	wālā		be-shak	is	meiñ	zaror	nishāniyāñ	haiñ	un	logon	ke	liye	ke	imān	rakhte	haiñ.

arabicText: وَيَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَفَزِعَ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَكُلٌّ أَتَوْهُ دَٰخِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	the	Day	when	the	Trumpet	is	blown	–	so	all	those	who	are	in	the	heavens	and	the	earth	will	
be	terrified,	except	whomever	Allah	wills;	and	everyone	has	come	to	Him,	in	submission.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jis	din	phoñkā	jāye	ga	soor	to	ghabrāye	jāyeñ	ge	jitney	āasmānoñ	meiñ	haiñ	aur	jitney	zameen	
meiñ	haiñ	magar	jise	khuda	chahe	aur	sab	us	ke	ḥuzoor	ḥazir	hoye	áājizi	karte.
